name: The Fool
uprightMeaning: Fresh starts invite trust in the unknown and playful curiosity. Openness attracts serendipity and bold adventures.
reversedMeaning: Reckless leaps bring avoidable chaos and scattered attention. Pause to ground yourself before committing to the next path.
description: A youth poised on the cliff edge ready to begin the soul's journey.

name: The Magician
uprightMeaning: Focused will channels resources into tangible results. Skilled communication aligns heaven and earth for manifestation.
reversedMeaning: Scattered intent dilutes power and manipulative tactics backfire. Recenter integrity before acting.
description: A conduit between realms who knows how to direct energy.

name: The High Priestess
uprightMeaning: Stillness reveals subtle truths and intuitive downloads. She invites you to trust inner knowing beyond logic.
reversedMeaning: Secrets withheld breed confusion and emotional withdrawal. Share what you sense rather than hiding behind silence.
description: Guardian of mysteries seated between light and shadow.

name: The Empress
uprightMeaning: Sensual abundance, creativity, and nurturing care blossom under her influence. She encourages you to receive and to create.
reversedMeaning: Neglecting your own needs leads to burnout and smothering behavior. Reclaim your pleasure and boundaries.
description: Earth mother archetype surrounded by fertile fields.

name: The Emperor
uprightMeaning: Structure, discipline, and leadership stabilize long-term ambitions. Claim your authority with clarity.
reversedMeaning: Rigidity and control issues block collaboration. Adapt your strategy to avoid isolation.
description: Sovereign ruler seated upon a stone throne.

name: The Hierophant
uprightMeaning: Tradition, mentorship, and shared belief systems offer guidance. Learning from elders anchors your path.
reversedMeaning: Dogma stifles growth when questioning is forbidden. Forge a personal philosophy beyond empty rules.
description: Spiritual teacher channeling ancestral wisdom.

name: The Lovers
uprightMeaning: Heart-led choices align values with partnership and purpose. Authentic connection sparks mutual growth.
reversedMeaning: Indecision and divided priorities erode intimacy. Reconcile inner conflict before committing.
description: Two figures blessed by a radiant angel.

name: The Chariot
uprightMeaning: Determined focus harnesses opposing forces toward victory. Confidence propels you through obstacles.
reversedMeaning: Impulsive force without aim causes burnout and scattered wins. Rein your ego before charging.
description: Warrior guiding a chariot pulled by sphinxes.

name: Strength
uprightMeaning: Compassionate courage tames inner beasts and fosters resilience. Soft power outlasts brute force.
reversedMeaning: Self-doubt and repressed anger sap vitality. Befriend your instincts instead of suppressing them.
description: Maiden calming a lion with gentle hands.

name: The Hermit
uprightMeaning: Solitude illuminates deeper wisdom and ancestral guidance. Retreat to integrate lessons.
reversedMeaning: Isolation becomes escapism when you refuse to re-engage. Share the lantern you found.
description: Sage holding a lantern atop a mountain.

name: Wheel of Fortune
uprightMeaning: Life spins through cycles of expansion and contraction. Align with change and seize emerging luck.
reversedMeaning: Clinging to control breeds frustration as tides shift. Surrender resistance to ride the turn.
description: Sacred wheel reminding us of fate's motion.

name: Justice
uprightMeaning: Balanced choices anchored in truth restore harmony. Accountability brings fair outcomes.
reversedMeaning: Bias and avoidance skew the scales. Face consequences honestly to realign.
description: Figure with sword and scales seated between pillars.

name: The Hanged Man
uprightMeaning: Voluntary surrender rewires perspective and invites enlightenment. Pause to see from a new angle.
reversedMeaning: Stagnation without purpose drains morale. Choose movement once insight lands.
description: Suspended seeker glowing with inner light.

name: Death
uprightMeaning: Graceful endings clear space for profound renewal. Transformation is inevitable and liberating.
reversedMeaning: Clinging to expired forms prolongs grief. Accept transition to regain momentum.
description: Armored figure riding through a fading landscape.

name: Temperance
uprightMeaning: Integration and moderation blend polarities into harmony. Flow patiently between extremes.
reversedMeaning: Imbalance resurfaces when you rush or overindulge. Recalibrate your rituals.
description: Angel mixing water between cups.

name: The Devil
uprightMeaning: Shadow desires, contracts, and obsessions surface for honest evaluation. Owning them restores choice.
reversedMeaning: Addiction and fear tighten chains when left unconscious. Break agreements that drain life force.
description: Horned figure binding two lovers by loose chains.

name: The Tower
uprightMeaning: Sudden upheaval dismantles false structures so truth can stand. Liberation strikes like lightning.
reversedMeaning: Resistance to change magnifies chaos. Rebuild with authenticity after the dust settles.
description: Lightning-struck tower with falling figures.

name: The Star
uprightMeaning: Hope and spiritual nourishment pour through calm presence. Vulnerability invites cosmic blessing.
reversedMeaning: Doubt clouds your ability to receive healing waters. Tend your faith gently.
description: Woman pouring water beneath a radiant star.

name: The Moon
uprightMeaning: Dreams and intuition whisper through misty pathways. Navigate uncertainty with instinct.
reversedMeaning: Illusions and anxiety distort reality when fear rules. Illuminate hidden motives.
description: Moonlit scene with canines and a lobster emerging.

name: The Sun
uprightMeaning: Vitality, joy, and clarity shine brightly on your endeavors. Celebrate progress openly.
reversedMeaning: Burnout or inflated ego can dim the light. Rest and gratitude keep radiance steady.
description: Child riding a white horse beneath the sun.

name: Judgement
uprightMeaning: Awakenings call you to respond with courage and forgiveness. Integrate lessons and rise anew.
reversedMeaning: Avoidance of truth delays evolution. Answer the trumpet with honest reflection.
description: Angelic trumpet reviving figures from coffins.

name: The World
uprightMeaning: Wholeness, completion, and travel across thresholds reward your dedication. Celebrate mastery.
reversedMeaning: Lingering attachments keep cycles unfinished. Close chapters intentionally before you move on.
description: Dancer within a laurel wreath encircled by guardians.

name: Ace of Cups
uprightMeaning: New feelings and emotional invitations overflow with grace. Vulnerability becomes sacred creative fuel.
reversedMeaning: Emotional blocks or withheld affection stunt renewal. Open the heart channel slowly.
description: Ace of Cups channels the emotions and relationships of the cups suit.

name: 2 of Cups
uprightMeaning: Partnership and heartfelt reflection create safe bonds. Mirrored empathy deepens trust.
reversedMeaning: Co-dependence or imbalance strains a bond. Restore self-love to rebalance.
description: 2 of Cups channels the emotions and relationships of the cups suit.

name: 3 of Cups
uprightMeaning: Community celebrations and friendship nourish the spirit. Shared joy multiplies blessings.
reversedMeaning: Oversocializing or gossip drains energy. Reconnect with authentic companions.
description: 3 of Cups channels the emotions and relationships of the cups suit.

name: 4 of Cups
uprightMeaning: Introspection invites reevaluation of desires. Quiet time renews appreciation.
reversedMeaning: Apathy and refusal of gifts block growth. Reengage with gratitude.
description: 4 of Cups channels the emotions and relationships of the cups suit.

name: 5 of Cups
uprightMeaning: Grief is honored so new possibilities can emerge. Feel fully to heal.
reversedMeaning: Living in regret blinds you to remaining cups. Shift focus gently forward.
description: 5 of Cups channels the emotions and relationships of the cups suit.

name: 6 of Cups
uprightMeaning: Sweet nostalgia and kindness restore innocence. Acts of generosity soothe the soul.

name: 7 of Cups
uprightMeaning: Imagination offers many alluring paths. Discern fantasy from viable dreams.

name: 8 of Cups
uprightMeaning: Leaving familiar emotional terrain leads to deeper meaning. Courage walks toward authenticity.

name: 9 of Cups

description: King of Cups channels the emotions and relationships of the cups suit.

uprightMeaning: Guided transition leads from turmoil toward serenity. Accept the ferry ride.

uprightMeaning: Strategic thinking and discretion help you navigate complex agendas. Rely on wit.

uprightMeaning: Anxiety peaks before dawn but invites compassionate self-talk. Examine the nightmare.

uprightMeaning: A painful cycle ends, clearing space for rebirth. Honor the lessons and release.
reversedMeaning: Refusing closure keeps you pinned to the ground. Stand up and begin again.

uprightMeaning: Curious study and sharp messages arrive unexpectedly. Observe and learn.
reversedMeaning: Gossip or restless nerves spark trouble. Ground your mind before speaking.

reversedMeaning: Impulsive words wound. Temper speed with empathy.

uprightMeaning: Strategic leadership and ethical judgment prevail. Rule with reason.

uprightMeaning: Tangible opportunities sprout from steady effort. Ground new ventures now.
reversedMeaning: Missed chances stem from hesitation. Plant seeds before soil dries.

reversedMeaning: Family expectations or outdated systems need revision. Modernize tradition.
